name: Archon Counter - Unofficial KeyForge Tracker
description: Archon Counter enables you to track the scores of up to two players in a game of KeyForge!  * Track Aember, Keys, and Chains for each player * Easy-to-use interface allows you to press Forge to automatically deduct 6 Aember, and customization options allow you to edit the cost of a Key. * History tracking allows you to undo misclicks * Bait and Switch button automatically resolves the cards effect  Archon Counter is unaffiliated with KeyForge and Fantasy Flight Games.
